🚀 Time to Supercharge Your Chrome Find! 🔍

✨ Quick Access
Just hit Alt + F (or Option + F on Mac) to launch Findly—your advanced search box that outperforms Chrome's native find function.

🔎 More Power
With Findly, effortlessly locate words, phrases and even regex matches on any webpage.
Plus, with our history feature, you can quickly access and reuse your previous searches!
Say goodbye to endless scrolling and hello to efficient browsing!

🎨 Personalized Experience
Get bored with yellow and orange highlights? Customize to match your style!
With Findly, you can adjust highlight colors and other appearance settings for a seamless, personalized find experience.
🌑 Dark mode also included!

👉 Try it Today!
Install Findly and enjoy smarter, faster finding!
